thread.title: great Hotel, excellent location
thread.title_full: great Hotel, excellent location - Review of Paris Marriott Opera Ambassador Hotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Salvo B
title: great Hotel, excellent location
text:
I stayed in this Hotel three days for a business meeting.
It was a very pleasant and comfortable stay.
Rooms are very nice, clean
The location is almost perfect, woking distance from most of the main attractions and just few steps away from huge shopping mall
in one word, perfect !
Room Tip: higher floors rooms are better ! See more room tips
